movie.title: Joyeux Noel
movie.plot: France, 1914, during World War I. On Christmas Eve, an extraordinary event takes place in the bloody no man's land that the French and the Scots dispute with the Germans…
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 11 nominations.
